attributes.action: Mps to accept the British public to clap for them in April in lieu of a payrise.
attributes.additional_details: Due to current circumstances I believe it would be the perfect gesture to show the British public that you're not just an mp for the money,but for the people.
attributes.background: In April this year take the payment of the British people clapping (on a day of your choosing)in lieu of a pay rise this year.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find more about IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk/
